title: Beautiful Beacon Street 2 Bed, C/D Trains, Longwood Med, CAT OK-9/1!
posting_body: Parking:: off-street parking is available for rent
Spacious and very bright two bedroom on the fourth floor of a beautiful Beacon Street brownstone(with an elevator), available 9/1!
This beautiful unit features hardwood floors, high ceilings, tons of windows, a renovated eat-in kitchen, two very good size bedrooms and plenty of charm and character!
This building has on-site management, laundry facilities, CATS ARE ALLOWED and PARKING IS AVAILABLE FOR RENT.
This unbelievable location is steps away from the C+D trains, The Longwood Medical Area, and just a short distance to Downtown Boston.
For further information and showings, call Heidi at 617-699-4568!
